# pedsuiteMonitor

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The **pedsuiteMonitor** is a Shiny app tracking the development of the [pedsuite](https://magnusdv.github.io/pedsuite/) packages.

Live app at https://magnusdv.shinyapps.io/pedsuiteMonitor/.
